name: Time To Rise!
description:
Time To Rise is a game where you have to escape a cave filling up with rising lava! Each level has an iron door for emergencies like this one. The thing is, if you don't make it in time, the iron door will shut to prevent any other lava from getting in.

If you find any bugs, please post them in the comments section so I can get around to fixing them as quick as I can!

I am releasing a beta version right now to see what people think. If it gets good reviews then I might add things like:

Multiplayer

More Levels

Maybe even a level editor if I can.
